insert into waybill_anomaly_log (id, waybill_anomaly_id, old_status, new_status, log_info, create_user_id, create_time) VALUES
(#{log.oldStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log.waybillAnomalyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{log.newStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log.logInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log.createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{log.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
